data.comment: A total of 3407 spectators is reported.
The match is underway at Neftyanik Stadium.
Important block from the Spartak Moscow defence as Timur Zhamaletdinov fires in a strike for Ufa.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Goal! Ufa take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Pavel Alikin.
In the minute 2, Oleg Danchenko with an assist there.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 5, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow surge into the attack at Neftyanik Stadium but Aleksandr Sobolevâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 9, In Ufa, Ezequiel Ponce of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Spartak Moscow have been given a penalty at Neftyanik Stadium...
Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 15, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Ufa's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Goal! Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Ufa.
Great play from Jordan Larsson to set up the goal.
In the minute 19, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
In the minute 22, In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Azer Aliev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ufa.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 26, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 27, Pavel Alikin (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Timur Zhamaletdinov of Ufa is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Bojan Jokic for Ufa is still down.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Bojan Jokic returns to the field for Ufa after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 37, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
It seems as if Bojan Jokic is unable to continue. Kirill Folmer replaces him for the home team.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 40, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Ufa's area.
In the minute 43, Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Aleksandr Sobolev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 44, Ufa have a goal kick.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Aleksey Nikitin is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Ufa's Aleksey Nikitin is back in action after a slight knock.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Ufa.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?

Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.

Jordan Larsson for Spartak Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 60, Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 62, Spartak Moscow's Aleksandr Sobolev attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Aleksandr Sobolev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Oleg Danchenko (Ufa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ezequiel Ponce for Spartak Moscow drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Timur Zhamaletdinov for the home team is judged to be offside.
Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Spartak Moscow are coming forward and Nail Umyarov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a second substitution, with Olivier Thill replacing Oleg Danchenko.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Ufa.
Zelimkhan Bakaev is replacing Ezequiel Ponce for the away team.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Ufa.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Ufa.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kirill Folmer (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Spartak Moscow's Zelimkhan Bakaev misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
The away team have replaced Jordan Larsson with Maksim Glushenkov. This is the second substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
In the minute 84, Vadim Evseev is making the team's third substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with Vyacheslav Krotov replacing Timur Zhamaletdinov.
In Ufa Ufa's Olivier Thill is caught offside.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 88, Spartak Moscow push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Maksim Glushenkov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ufa defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Ufa, Ayrton Lucas of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
